CS 315 Student List: 2022 Names go HERE Rich Tanner Clinical Professor of DET Prof Tanner String Alissa Davis Random Prompt Generator Generate prompts for AI...

Roll an array of dice...
Build good daily habits...

The user gets to select a type of dice and then roll it to get a result. It is very helpful for people who play DnD games or those who rely on chance to make decisions.
The user makes daily habits they want to develop. They can set reminders to remind themself to check the habit off their list for the day. The list resets at midnight in their local time.
This widget allows users to check their grades on their home screen without having to open their school app.
This app allows users to generate random prompts from a dictionary to use for AI generators (for instance, Dall-E image generator).
Anthony Moncivais CS and DET Student at ACU Lvl Up An app to track things such as workouts, studying, diet etc... and provides players with a stats sheet just like those that can be found in RPGs. The idea is to get people that would normally invest a lot of time on leveling up a virtual character to spend some time leveling themselves up Church Geolocator An app to search the area around you to find churches in the area and provide you with basic information to get connected
Noah Massie Senior Student of DET Noah Massie Info Mythos Tree App Possibilities Interactive Mythological Tree which allows you to select a pantheon and then learn which gods were supposed to affect which aspects of life such as love, agriculture, war, and so on, while also providing their family trees and possibly the backgrounds/origins of the individual gods.
Bailey Kimmel Elle Woods but Computer Science Abilene alone has over 30 nail bars. This proposes an issue women face: Which one has the shortest wait? NailTime would allow nail bars to post their wait times which would clear waiting rooms, boost business, and accommodate the customer. Marlon Eduardo Miller Risky World Accounting The Risky World App is an Accounting Website idea, designed by my father and developed by me, is a accounting database system keeping track of general information, parameters, catalogs, and users from different departments inside a company from Honduras. This app is fully dynamic, where administrators can add, delete or change information constantly by accessing their accounts, modifying records and assigning tasks to several other administrators and users.
Risky World is an accountability prototype system architecture designed to implement basic security to several roles for users, implement basic parameters and functionalities in the applications, building registration, wholesale in accounting items and a clean and integral financial status for the company. MDog\'s Incrediblely Bad Ideas I wanted to elaborate more on the apps I thought about creating. The inventors app is an app where inventors can post new ideas and request funds, material, and assistance. The Snack Raid app is an app that keeps track of the snackage in your house and has a randomizer if you dont know what to snack on. Lastly, have you ever wanted to capatilize..I mean spread the new online age of dating? Why spend over a hundred dollars on a cheap bluetooth LED when you can spend 1 dollar on a cheap piece of software! With Couple Buttons, you can now instagate (that means start) conversations with your partner. Simply register thier phone number as well as your own, create your buttons, and chat with the ease of a simple push.
Benjamin Blackmon Senior DET Major Benjamin\'s App Ideas List Maker
List Maker is a super customizable list creator. There will be one main view where you can add "categories" to it. A category can have another category added to it, or a list. A list is comprised of a bunch of smaller items that can be given a priority, a date, and have reminders set on it for notifications. The main view can have categories and lists added to it so you can see only lists in the category for "school", or perhaps only one list for when you go shopping. This is to get the best parts of the inheritance system (where we can store categories and lists inside of other categories for organizational purposes), while also being able to show multiple lists at the same time (say, multiple classes for school). The items shown in the main view can be sorted by priority, due date, reminder date, or alphabetically (and any other types of sorting things that might be helpful.
RPG Life
RPG Life is an app about taking real life progress and turning it into something more quantifiable. Users will be able to add types of work and prescribe it to a particular stat (strength, intelligence, dexterity, etc.). This will improve their stats and they will be able to have numbers to display actual growth to motivate people for their progress.
Mike Rageur Computer Science Mike Rageur String What I planned on having for the livestream app is allowing the app to have web extension. Other competitors don\'t have the web extension features resulting mobile users missing out on the fun of raid or chat spam. Extentions like 7TV and BetterTV allows certain word to become GIF or picture.
An app that will consist of 2 sections, one for lost dogs, and one for found dogs. This allows the user to input any information about any dogs that are lost and/or found. This app will also notify the user if there is any matching information when the 2 sections are compared.
Future Goals: Adding in location services for near by areas.

Evan Grau Sophomore CS Student Evan Grau\'s Page Bible App But Better In my new Bible app, you can do everything your old Bible app could do, like reading the Bible, doing devotionals, and setting reading plans, but I\'m also bringing back INDULGENCES!! Need to get into heaven for sure? Just pay your way straight to the pearly gates! All it takes is a measly $100,000 per person straight to my bank accou- I mean God! So what do you say? You want your boring old Bible app, or do you want the Bible app, but better? TODO
Kelli Norris Student of DET Notes App Griffin Barnard CS Student at ACU Griffin\'s Really Cool Page Class Helper Have you ever found accountability when many miles away from home hard to find? Even if you haven\'t, no need to worry anymore! Class Helper is designed to solve all your problems(As long as they are the very specific problems CLass Helper was designed to solve). \n\n Class Helper provides a variety of ways to help you stay on top of your classes. It provides you reminders both an hour before your classes and immediately after to study and review. This is done to increase learning and retention. Class Helper will also prompt you on both Saturday and Sunday to enter your homework and its due times for the week. then Class helper will periodically remind you to due your homework, with increasing frequency as the deadline for the homework approaches.
//AlexB Strings Alexander Burgos, CS Alexander Burgos CS Master Race Alex Burgos, CS

OnlyWaifus
Learn how to gear up like a Chad.
One-stop shop for waifu merch.
Clayton Arnett Student of ACU CS Clayton Arnett String Play Volleyball! Play Volleyball! will be a brand new app that lets you see all the nearest places where volleyball is being played. Volleyball is my favorite sport to play and I often struggle with finding places to play at or people to play with. This app will let you see the location of where volleyball is being played, approximately how many people are playing, and the skill level of the people there.\n\nThis app will be a huge help for anyone looking to play locally and will also serve as a great way to connect with others as well as the community! Play Volleyball\'s mission is to simply get more people active and playing the best sport in the world.
